title.rendered: Nick Guy: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Nick Guy
    • Professional Career
  • Nick Guy’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
  • Personal Details
    • Relationship Status
    • How Old is Nick Guy?
    • How tall is he?
    • What is his nationality?
    • Career Highlights
    • FAQs About Nick Guy

Nick Guy is a professional rodeo contestant known for his exceptional skills in steer wrestling. With eight National Finals Rodeo (NFR) qualifications under his belt, Guy has made a name for himself in the world of rodeo.

Here you can follow Nick Guy’s net worth, career earnings, career, biography, achievements, relationship status, and more.

About Nick Guy

Nick Guy was born in Sparta, Wisconsin. He started his rodeo journey by qualifying for the College National Finals Rodeo four years in a row while attending National American University in Rapid City, South Dakota.

Guy earned his bachelor’s degree in business administration during his time at the university.

Professional Career

As of 2023, Nick has qualified for the NFR eight times.

At 39 years old, he is the oldest steer wrestler in the Top 15. Some of his notable achievements include winning the Rodeo de Sante Fe, the Colorado State Fair & Rodeo, and being a co-champion at the Kit Carson County Pro Rodeo.

Nick Guy’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Nick Guy’s net worth is estimated to be $5 million.

The steer wrestler has accumulated $1,240,778 in career earnings. He has made $96,317 in PRCA earnings.

Career Earnings

Nick Guy’s career earnings primarily come from his winnings in various rodeo events. As of 2023, his career earnings amounted to $1,240,778.

With a good performance at the National Finals Rodeo (NFR) in 2023, he could potentially cross $1.5 million in career earnings.

Personal Details

Relationship Status

Steer wrestler Nick Guy prefers to keep his private life away from the spotlight. His relationship status is unknown.

How Old is Nick Guy?

As of 2023, Nick Guy is 39 years old.

How tall is he?

He stands at 6 ft 3 inches.

What is his nationality?

He is an American.

Career Highlights

  • Career earnings: $1,240,778
  • 2022 world standings place: 12th
  • 2022 Wrangler NFR standings place: 14th
  • 2022 Wrangler NFR earnings: $70,859
  • 2022 earnings: $148,880
  • Wrangler NFR Qualifications: 7 (2010, 2014-18, 2022)

2023 Highlights

• Won the Rodeo de Sante Fe (N.M.)

• Won the Snake River Stampede (Nampa, Idaho)

• Won the Colorado State Fair & Rodeo (Pueblo, Colo.)

• Co-champion at the Kit Carson County Pro Rodeo (Burlington, Colo.)

• Co-champion at the Magic Valley Stampede (Filer, Idaho)

• Co-champion at the New Mexico (Albuquerque, N.M.) State Fair & Rodeo

FAQs About Nick Guy

What is Nick Guy’s net worth?

$5 million as of 2023.

How many times has he qualified for the National Finals Rodeo (NFR)?

8 times, as of 2023.

What is his primary rodeo event?

Steer Wrestling.

Where was he born?

Sparta, Wisconsin.
